@ TheShadowz

The last nine episodes of Season 2 began airing on June 4, 2010 in the United States (CBS) and were shown in a different order from their original broadcast on CTV. CBS, however, is erroneously referring to these episodes as "Season 3". A 13-episode third season was produced in Toronto from January to May, 2010 and began airing in July 2010 on both CTV and CBS.
On May 9, 2011, CTV announced a fourth season of Flashpoint to begin on June 17, 2011; the new season is to be simulcast by CBS

@ angelclawdust: Thanks for pointing that ^^ out :D .

And yes I will also upload the 4th season once it has aired. It's scheduled to premiere on June 17.
And also a 5th season is already ordered ;).
